doc:
Irene Ryan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Irene_Ryan 0 Irene Ryan (born Jessie Irene Noblitt; October 17, 1902 – April 26, 1973) was an American actress who found success in vaudeville, radio, film, television, and Broadway. Ryan is most widely known for her portrayal of Daisy May "Granny" Moses, the mother-in-law of Buddy Ebsen's character, on the long-running TV series The Beverly Hillbillies (1962–1971), for which she was nominated for Emmy Awards for Outstanding Lead Actress in a Comedy Series in 1963 and 1964. Irene_Ryan ( born Jessie_Irene_Noblitt ; October_17_,_1902 – April_26_,_1973 ) was an_American_actress who found success in vaudeville_,_radio_,_film_,_television , and Broadway . Ryan is most_widely known for her_portrayal of Daisy_May_"_Granny_"_Moses , the_mother-in-law of Buddy_Ebsen 's_character , on the_long-running_TV_series The_Beverly_Hillbillies_(_1962 – 1971_) , for which she was_nominated for Emmy_Awards for Outstanding_Lead_Actress in a_Comedy_Series in 1963_and_1964 .
